# Structure
The Aelorian government consists of several ministries, each with a responsibility to society as a whole. Within each ministry sits a specific structure of staff who run the ministry as follows:

```diagram

```





# Branches / Micro-States

## Ministry of Agriculture 
Responsible for food production, crop cultivation, and the management of agricultural resources. They focus on sustainable farming practices and ensuring food security.
- [Ministry of Agriculture](/reference/species/aelorian/government/agriculture)
{.links-list}
> Represented by a wreath made of grain surrounding a depiction of a tilled field goinf up and inward from the bottom up. like the atari logo.
{.is-info}


---
## Ministry of Commerce
Manages trade agreements, economic development, and commerce within and beyond Aeloria. They work to ensure a thriving economy and international relations. Also runs the national treasury, mint, and bank.
- [Ministry of Comerce](/reference/species/aelorian/government/commerce)
{.links-list}
> Represented by two wings folded over eachother like a interlocking handshake (can also be described as a pair of wings arm wrestling)
{.is-info}


---
## Ministry of Environment
Focused on preserving and protecting the planet's ecosystems, biodiversity, and natural resources. They work to ensure a sustainable and healthy environment. Also handled on transportation networks, city planning, and infrastructure development. They maintain roads, bridges, and transportation systems. Also manages energy resources, resource allocation, and sustainable practices. They work to minimize resource depletion and environmental impact. Also in charge of recycling, and waste management.

The ministry of environment is the merging of the ministries of energy, ministry of preservation, and ministry of infrastructure. 
- [Ministry of Environment](/reference/species/aelorian/government/environment)
{.links-list}
> Logo is unknown
{.is-danger}
---
## Ministry of Health
Responsible for healthcare services, medical research, and public health initiatives. They strive to provide quality healthcare to all Aelorians. 
- [Ministry of Health](/reference/species/aelorian/government/health)
{.links-list}
> Represented by a equal length cross, made of two wings that start on the left and right side of the cross, and bend up and down respectively to form the top and bottom arms of the cross.
{.is-info}

---
## Ministry of Heritage
Promotes artistic expression, cultural heritage, and the preservation of Aelorians' cultural identity. They support artists, performers, and cultural events. Also supports religious institutions, spiritual practices, and the moral and ethical well-being of Aelorians. They foster a sense of unity and spirituality. Also in charge of the Archives. Also handles tourism.
- [Ministry of Heritage](/reference/species/aelorian/government/heritage)
{.links-list}
> Logo is unknown
{.is-danger}

---
## Ministry of Innovation
Dedicated to technological research, development, and innovation. They create and maintain advanced technologies that benefit Aelorians in various aspects of life. Also promotes scientific research, space exploration, and the expansion of knowledge. They may be responsible for space missions and interstellar communication. 
- [Ministry of Innovation](/reference/species/aelorian/government/innovation)
{.links-list}
> Logo is unknown
{.is-danger}

---
## Ministry of Justice
Responsible for the legal system, legislative process, and the administration of justice. They ensure fairness, equality, and adherence to laws. They also handle foreign laws, like import and export laws, etc.
- [Ministry of Justice](/reference/species/aelorian/government/justice)
{.links-list}
> Logo is an abstract design featuring celestial elements, such as stars and moons, forming a balanced composition. This symbolizes the universal and timeless nature of justice.
{.is-warning}

---
## Ministry of Peace
Law enforcement, military personal, etc. 
- [Ministry of Peace](/reference/species/aelorian/government/peace)
{.links-list}
> Represented by a 4 pointed shooting star, with a large focus on the star itself.
{.is-info}

---
## Crisis Corps
Global emergency and crisis response. Firefighting, emergency services, etc.
- [Crisis Corps](/reference/species/aelorian/government/crisis)
{.links-list}
> Represented by a Star of Life formed with 6 feathers or wings
{.is-info}
# Defunct Ministries
Some ministries became redundant, or required more resources then they could pull individually, resulting in the occasional merger of their duties.
## Ministry of Education
Devoted to education and knowledge dissemination. They oversee schools, universities, and libraries, ensuring access to information and education for all. Merged into the Ministry of Heritage.
> Represented by a tree made of feathers, indicating the growth and foundations of education in society.

---
## Ministry of Energy
Manages energy resources, resource allocation, and sustainable practices. They work to minimize resource depletion and environmental impact. Also in charge of recycling, and waste management. Absorbed by the Ministry of Enviroment.
> Represented by a lightning bolt.

---
## Ministry of Infrastructure
Focuses on transportation networks, city planning, and infrastructure development. They maintain roads, bridges, and transportation systems. Absorbed by the Ministry of Environment.
> Represented by a tower with a crane on each side forming an upside down wing shape with the mirrored machinery.
